front: What property of the inner product states that (a u) . v = a(u . v)?
back: It is **linear in the first argument**.

front: How is the norm (length) of a vector v defined using the inner product?
How are mutually exclusive class labels typically represented in multi-class classification?
back: Using a **one-hot vector** y~ in R^C.
